lyrics.stanza: Tremendous news! How marvellous! God wants to dwell as one with us! Though we are base, unworthy men, God never sways from His intent.
What great news! Myst'ry true! God wants to dwell with me and you! Forever one, at rest we'll be, Enjoying God eternally! What great news! Myst'ry true! God wants to dwell with me and you!
